name: Space Shooter Game.
description:
Hello! This is my first project on itch.io!

It is also available at https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/556747097/

Click here to view this on Scratch (scratch.mit.edu).

How to view?

After you download, go to scratch.mit.edu/create. Remove the tutorial by clicking on the cross button. Then click on 'File', then click on 'Load from your computer' and select the downloaded file. Click on 'Ok' and then click on the green flag and play! To stop, click on the icon just in the right side of the green flag! 

Thanks,

APP-DEVELOPER!
